name: Autolink does not modify posts made by Bot accounts by default

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. Add an autolink pattern such as LHS that would edit the text `LHS`(see test data)
2. As a bot, make a post that contains text "LHS"
inline.expectedResult: Autolink formatting is not applied to bot posts

inline.description:
1. Enable Process Bot Posts ex: `/autolink set lhs ProcessBotPosts true`
2. As a bot, make a post that contains text "LHS"
inline.expectedResult: Autolink formatting is now applied to bot posts

customFields.Important notes about this step: For 2. - You can use something such as `curl -i -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"channel_id":"<>", "message":"This is a message matching LHS pattern from a bot with mention for @dkh-sysadmin and @dkh-member", "props":{}}' -H 'Authorization: Bearer <>' https://<>/api/v4/posts`
